template.description: Dear Parent, we wish your ward All The Best for the SSLC Exam. Thank You. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.
RTE Parents, bring all original documents of your child for RTE application verification on (Date) @ (Time). Thank You. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.

Dear Parent, (Function / Competition) will be held on (Date) at (Time) in School Premises.Kindly send your child to school on time to be a part of the (Function/Competition). Thank You. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.
Dear Parent, (Summer/Winter) vacation starts from (Start_date) and reopens on (End_Date). Thank You. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.
Dear Parents, (Date) will be holiday on occasion of (Reason for holiday). Thank You. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.
Dear Parents, Parents Meeting is going to be held on (Date) at (Time). Please attend without fail. Thank you. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.
Dear Parents, the results of (Mid Term/Annual Exams) will be announced on (Date) at (Time). Thank you. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.
Dear Parents, The (Mid Term/Annual Term) Exams will begin from (Start date) to (End Date). Thank You. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.
Dear Parents, The (Unit test number) will begin from (Start date) to (End Date). Thank you. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.
Dear Parents, you are requested to pay the (First Term/Second Term) fee before (Date). Ignore if already paid. Thank you. From: CES High School, Yadgiri.
Dear Parents, (Date) will be holiday due to (Reason). Thank You. From: CES High School, Yadgir.
